title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions
text: {samplezoo} package simplifies generation samples various probability distributions, enabling users quickly create datasets demonstrations, troubleshooting, teaching. prioritizing simplicity speed customization sample parameters, {samplezoo} ideal beginners anyone looking save time working data.

what: samplezoo: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo-package
title: samplezoo: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo-package
text: Simplifies process generating samples variety probability distributions, allowing users quickly create data frames demonstrations, troubleshooting, teaching purposes. Data available multiple sizes—small, medium, large. information, refer package documentation.

title: samplezoo: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo-package

what: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
text: name character string specifying dataset size. three dataset sizes : small: Generates data frame 100 samples per distribution. medium: Generates data frame 1,000 samples per distribution. large: Generates data frame 10,000 samples per distribution.

title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
text: distributions included data frame : norm: Normal distribution mean standard deviation parameters. norm_2: Slight variation normal distribution. norm_3: Another slight variation normal distribution. bern: Bernoulli distribution. neg: Negative binomial distribution. pois: Poisson distribution. exp: Exponential distribution. unif: Uniform distribution. beta: Beta distribution. gamma: Gamma distribution. chi_sq: Chi-squared distribution. t_dist: Student's t-distribution. f_dist: F-distribution.

title: Generate Samples with a Variety of Probability Distributions — samplezoo
code: small_data <- samplezoo("small") medium_data <- samplezoo("medium") large_data <- samplezoo("large")

title: samplezoo 1.2.2
text: Fixed Bernoulli distribution Made dfs constant across sample sizes Fixed documentation Clarified set.seed function vignette

title: samplezoo 1.2.1
text: Added support F distribution. Corrected notation errors (e.g., norm2 instead norm_2)
